settings.para-carees: W is a Premium Fusion Wear Brand that merges Indian and western sensibilities with an emphasis on distinctive design and styling. The brand primarily caters to the contemporary Indian woman’s work, casual and light occasion wear requirements. W also has a specially curated collection called FOLKSONG. It is an exclusive collection which offers Authentic, Soulful and Handcrafted products.
Aurelia is a contemporary ethnic wear brand. It caters to the quintessential Indian woman who seeks a branded experience with consistent good quality products with great fit.

Wishful is a premium occasion wear brand, with elegant ethnic designs catering to women’s evening and occasion wear requirements. Every outfit is crafted using minute detailing and embellishments to give the garment a sophisticated look.

Elleven is a coordinates brand with a brand promise to be the ultimate destination for fashion bottoms. It caters to a woman who seeks fashionable bottom wear that fit well and suit her functional needs.

settings.para-main-carees: TCNS is one of the largest women’s fashion & lifestyle company in India, with four segment defining brands - W, Aurelia, Wishful and Elleven. Since it’s founding, TCNS has deployed a business model marked by creative momentum, consumer centricity and constant quest for excellence. Today, it provides a complete wardrobe solution to the contemporary Indian woman for multiple occasions. The company designs, manufactures, markets and retails a wide portfolio of women’s branded apparel, footwear, cosmetics and accessories across different brands. Sold across India, Mauritius, Sri lanka and Nepal, TCNS has a dominant presence in the market with over 550+ exclusive brand stores, 2000+ large format stores, 1000+ multi-brand outlets, online brand stores and leading marketplaces.
